name: Two Big Feet
description:
Late one night from work you get an email from an old friend, asking for a favor. He wants to know if you'd be willing to talk down his kid who's all in a huff over Bigfoots!

And you, my friend.

Are one.

Enjoy a fun short story about a Bigfoot trying to calm down a scared child, and convince her they don't exist, aren't a threat, or some other way to get her to relax. Your choices will affect your HEART and SUSPICION though, so choose wisely!

Totally not a trans allegory. Haha. Just silly Bigfoot shenanigans!

Trigger Warning

The following story contains allegorical depictions of transphobia, dysmorphia, discrimination, anxiety, and use of media to spread false information concerning vulnerable groups.
